taskMan.view

Class TaskView

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskMan.view.TaskView

  • public class TaskView
extends java.lang.Object
    A taskView is a wrapper for tasks. The taskView only has limited access to the task and is thus safe to send out to the UI. The UI will hence also only have limited access to the underlying tasks and cannot do anything unauthorized.
    Author:
    Tim Van den Broecke, Joran Van de Woestijne, Vincent Van Gestel and Eli Vangrieken

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getOverTimePercentage

        public int getOverTimePercentage(java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime)

        Returns:

      • getRequiredResources

        public java.util.Map<ResourceView,java.lang.Integer> getRequiredResources()
        Retrieve a map of the task's required resources. This map will map an abstract resource type on the quantity required of that resource.
        Returns:
        a map containing the required resources and their respective required quantities

      • getPossibleStartingTimes

        public java.util.List<java.time.LocalDateTime> getPossibleStartingTimes(java.util.List<ResourceView> concRes,
                                                                        java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime,
                                                                        int amount)
        A method to retrieve a given amount of possible starting times. A task is possible to start when enough resources are available for the estimated duration of the task (taking into account developer pauses and availability periods of resources). These suggested starting times can be used by a project manager to plan the task in a specific slot.
        Parameters:
        concRes - | A list of all the resources (possible abstract resource types or concrete resources) that all should be available for the estimated duration of the task
        currentTime - | The time to start counting from
        amount - | The amount of suggestions that should be returned
        Returns:
        a given amount of suggested starting times for the task to be planned at

        otherView - | The other view to compare with
